comment: Dr. Boss was pretty cool! She's really chill. Pretty much everything is done in a group & you have to teach the class with a group. I took her for a hybrid, so all tests and quizzes were online. If you don't get the book, you'll be lost so don't even try it.

Dr. Boss was pretty nice. She's gentle and sweet but sometimes her class can be a little boring. I took her class as a hybrid. Most activities in the class are group-oriented, so if you're shy, shake it off! You have a quiz every week, a group project and yes, you will need to buy the textbook.
